data.text: Elihu nomedo wuoyo kawacho niya:
“Wena thuolo matin mondi to abiro nyisi
Ngʼeyo ma an-go agolo kuma bor;
Bed kingʼeyo ni wechena ok gin miriambo;
“Nyasaye nyalo duto, to kata kamano ok ochayo ji;
Ok owe joricho kangima,
Ok ogol wangʼe oko kuom joma kare;
Ka otwe ji gi nyiroro,
to onyisogi gik magisetimo;
Omiyo giwinje korieyogi
Ka giwinjo wachne mi gitiyone,
To ka gitamore winje,
“Joma okia Nyasaye chunygi opongʼ gi mirima
Omiyo githo ka kapod gitindo
To joma ni e chandruok oreso e chandruokgi;
“Ogoli e masiche kendo oteri kama onge chandruok
Sani to koro eri iyudo kum maromre gi joricho;
Bed motangʼ kik ngʼato wuondi gi mwandu,
Koso iparo ni mwanduni mathoth
Kik igomb mondo piny oyusi,
Tangʼ mondo chandruok
“Parie kaka teko Nyasaye duongʼ
En ngʼa manyalo nyiso Nyasaye yore monego oluw,
Kik wiyi wil mak ipako tijene
Ji duto modak e piny osenene
Mano kaka Nyasaye duongʼ,
“Ochoko ngʼich mar pi kogolo ewi pige,
omiyo koth chue
En ngʼa mongʼeyo kaka boche polo ringo,
Neye kaka omiyo mil polo menyo kor polo duto,
Kamano e kaka orito ogendini
Omako mil polo gi lwete
Mor polo miyo wangʼeyo ni koth maduongʼ chiegni chue,
